content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review the following article to have basic understanding about how to troubleshoot and detected the reason of most common issues with access to EPAM internal applications and services: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/8-FFFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Troubleshooting issues with internal applications\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
